resources.string: What are your sources? How is the data gathered for this project?
We are using 3rd party API aslo the government of Bangladesh API to update the data.
Why are you guys putting in time and resources to do this while not gaining a single penny from it?

Because it affects all of us. Today it\'s someone else who is getting infected; tomorrow it could be us. We need to prevent the spread of this virus. We need to document the data so that people with knowledge can use this data to make informed decisions.

○ Fever (below 99 degrees) 
○ Sore throat 
○ Headache 
○ Thin closet, Diarrhea, Vomiting 
○ No sense of smell 
○ Dry cough 
○ Fatigue / Weakness 
○ Muscle pain 
○ No taste in the mouth

○ Fever (below 99 degrees) 
○ Sore throat 
○ Headache 
○ Dry cough 
○ Fatigue / Weakness 
○ Muscle pain 
○ No taste in the mouth 
○ Thin closet, Diarrhea, Vomiting 
○ No sense of smell

○ With previous symptoms
○ Fever (101–102 degrees)
○ Feeling shivering in the body (Regularly)
○ Heavy cough
○ Shortness of breath (oxygen saturation below 94%)
○ Fatigue
○ Body Pain
○ Muscle pain

○ With previous symptoms
○ Severe shortness of breath
○ Not able to eat
○ Dehydration
○ Frequent vomiting
○ Speaking incoherently / confusion / semi-conscious / subconscious
○ Bluish appearance / lips / tongue
○ Eye problems (e.g. watery eyes, swollen eyes, etc.)

○ Fatigue
○ Severe shortness of breath
○ Nervous complications
○ Sleeping problem
○ Difficulty remembering / difficulty concentrating
○ Cough
○ Muscle pain
○ Rapid heartbeat
○ Depression / Anxiety 
○ Rash
○ Hair fall
○ No test in the mouth
○ No sense of smell

○ Swollen tongue
○ Sore throat
○ Chest pain
○ Feeling red on the soles of the feet
○ Eye irritation
○ Diarrhea 
○ Pale color of hands and toes
○ Blow in the face
○ Inflammation of the palms of the hands
○ Hair fall
○ Headache
○ Skin Rash
In case of post covid symptoms
